issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

comments.body:
[~tzhang] Thanks for reporting the problem.
It is a bug that needs to be fixed. The fundamental reason is that the {{BitVector}} has a type width of 0, so a special implementation is required for it.
If this problem blocks you, I think you can work around by using {{BitVectorHelper#concatBits}}, which efficiently concats two bit buffers.

[~fan_li_ya] Thanks for the confirmation! I did more testing and seems like there is also problem for other types of vectors (DecimalVector, Float8Vector, etc.), I would suggest to test all vector types when you have time for the fix. For now, I'm using CopyFrom to copy the data row by row.
[~tzhang] Thanks for the additional information. I will conduct more tests for other types as well.

[~tzhang] I have provided a patch for the BitVector. Please check. 
I have not found the problem for the DecimalVector and Float8Vector. Could you please provide more details about the problem?
[~fan_li_ya] Sorry I miss the previous message and thanks for fixing this! I will check the other vector types again on my side and let you know if I see a problem :)
